  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the controller after the root element has been completely processed.

      Initializes resource and browser managers, caches the initial dashboard content node, and updates the welcome label with the current authenticated user's full name if present in the session.

      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if unknown.
      resources - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if not localized.

    • handleDiscover

      public void handleDiscover()
      Loads and displays the discover view by updating the main content area

    • handleResources

      public void handleResources()
      Loads and displays the tracks view by updating the main content area

    • handleMe

      public void handleMe()
      Handles the action to display the "Me" view in the main content area. It updates the mainContent pane by loading the view specified by ME_VIEW_PATH. If an error occurs during loading, an error alert is shown and the exception message is logged.

    • handleLogout

      public void handleLogout()
      Logs out the current user by calling the ViewManager.logout() method. Displays an error alert if the logout process fails.
